item.title: Adam in Chains
item.description: [[songs/p/porcupine_tree/in_absentia/strip_the_soul.md#do-you-want-a-western-home-in-the-rubble-vyl-wnanory|(Do you want to be hypnotized?)]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/baby_its_you.md#its-not-the-way-you-smile-that-touched-my-heart-vyl-wnanory|(All you have to do is move your body]] [[songs/t/the_last_internationale/we_will_reign/baby_its_you.md#its-not-the-way-you-smile-that-touched-my-heart-vyl-wnanory|In what ever way feels comfortable for you)]] [[songs/p/parkway_drive/atlas/the_river.

item.title: Heroin
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/falling_behind.md#now-im-being-something-im-not-something-im-not-vyl-wnanory|Well, I wish, I was born a thousand years ago]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/falling_behind.md#now-im-being-something-im-not-something-im-not-vyl-wnanory|And I wish that I sailed the darkened sea]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/falling_behind.

item.title: Love Labours On
item.description: [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/coming_back_down.md#i-know-youre-coming-back-down-vyl-wnanory|Back through time, I know]] [[songs/h/hollywood_undead/american_tragedy/coming_back_down.md#i-know-youre-coming-back-down-vyl-wnanory|You’re calling me]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/wildlife/a_broken_jar.md#i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|For a saviour, I know]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/wildlife/a_broken_jar.md#i-dont-know-vyl-wnanory|It’s my destiny]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/meteora/breaking_the_habit.md#i-dont-know-whats-worth-fighting-for-or-why-i-have-to-scream-vyl-wnanory|So I’m gonna rise,]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/meteora/breaking_the_habit.
